column1:
Gym closed?
Feeling like a fat piece of crap?
Don’t let #coronavirus ruin your gains.
Get large tire from junkyard. Flip it. Beat hell out of it with a sledgehammer. Get a used keg from a party store. Fill it half with water, carry it around.
#Strongman training, be creative
